effect.Name: JPEG Compression (Switch)
effect.description: Effect gives a compression effect similar to JPEG, but not exactly the same!
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo JPEG Compression (Switch) Shader | 1.1 (13.08.2025) */
parameter.description: Effect gives a compression effect similar to JPEG, but not exactly the same!

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines which color will be the basis for modification. Set to 0 means it will be the texture of the object and set to 1 it will be the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: YLevels
parameter.description: This variable specifies how many brightness levels there should be.

parameter.name: CLevels
parameter.description: This variable specifies how many brightness colors there should be.

parameter.name: _BlurScale
parameter.description: This variable determines the degree of smoothness between pixels. Set to 0, none; set to 1, smooth transition between pixels.

parameter.name: _Segments
parameter.description: This variable determines how many pixels are required to draw one larger pixel. The smaller the value, the less noticeable the effect; the larger the value, the more noticeable the effect of "texture resolution reduction."

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
